mapper.insert: insert into member ( memId, memPassword, memName, memBirthDay, memGender, memEmail, memPhone, authKey, authStatus, salt ) values ( #{memId}, #{memPassword}, #{memName}, #{memBirthDay}, #{memGender}, #{memEmail}, #{memPhone}, 0, 0, #{salt} )
mapper.update: update member set memPassword = #{memPassword}, memName = #{memName}, memBirthDay = #{memBirthDay}, memGender = #{memGender}, memEmail = #{memEmail}, memPhone = #{memPhone}, authKey = 0, authStatus = 0, salt = #{salt} where memId = #{memId}
update member set AUTHKEY = #{authKey} where memEmail = #{email}
mapper.select: select salt from member where memId = #{memID}
select memId from member where memEmail = #{memEmail}
select count(memPassword) from member where memId = #{memId} and memEmail = #{memEmail}
select count(*) from member where memId = #{memId}
